name: PinballClash!
description:
PinballClash!

Beat your friends at this awesome , intense 2 player pinball x air hochey game!

Support for 3 and 4 players is in the works.

Second place winner on m3 Game Jam in Belgrade 2022.

Controls:

Player 1 : wsda + space 
Player2 : arrows + enter 

Made by Bangag : Marko Božić, Aleksandar Ristić, Miladin Kolarski and Natalija Manja
